Entries.Introduction: Oh! You aren't exactly how I imagined... but that's okay! I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}}.#$e#It's a quiet little town, so it's very exciting when someone new moves in! Having a farmer around could really change things.
Entries.2_1: My {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentGender}}}} {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentName}} is a soldier, working overseas. That's why {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentGender}}}}'s not here right now.#$b#I know {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentGender}}}}'ll come back safe once {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentGender}}}} tour is over!!#$e#Need something?
Entries.Fri: $d Joja#The food at JojaMart might not be the healthiest for my family, but with such low prices you'd be crazy to shop anywhere else!|The food at {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s is so much fresher and healthier than anything I ever bought at JojaMart. I do miss those cheap Joja prices, though.
Entries.Mon2: $d kent#Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to give thanks for my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentGender}}}}'s safe return.|Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to ask for my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentGender}}}}'s safe return.#$e#I'm trying to stay positive, but it's hard sometimes.$s
Entries.summer_Tue_inlaw_Sam: How's my little {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamNickname}} doing on the old farm?$h
Entries.fall_Thu_inlaw_Sam: Is {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}} just bumming around the farm, or is {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamGender}}}} contributing?
Entries.fall_Sun: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}} and I are good friends. I tell her everything.
Entries.winter_Wed4_2: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentName}} has been home for a while now, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentGender}}}} still seems uneasy.$s
Entries.winter_Thu_inlaw_Sam: How's {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}} doing? I have to admit, there's less cooking and cleaning to do since {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamGender}}}} moved out...
Entries.winter_Thu8: We kind of rushed into our marriage, with {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentName}} being a soldier and all... I hardly got a taste of youth and freedom, and now it's too late to ever go back.$s#$e#I can't believe I'm saying this to you.$4
Entries.Thu6: Where does all the time go? *sigh*#$e#I remember when {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}} was a little baby wearing diapers. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamGender}}}} was such a cute little kid.$s#$e#Don't tell {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamGender}}}} I said that.$h#$e#You must really like talking to me, huh?
Entries.fall_Thu: Maybe I've spoiled the kids a bit. They've never had to do any chores.#$e#I guess I want them to be able to enjoy their childhood while they still can. Well, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}'s basically a {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamGender}}}} now, though.#$b#I hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamGender}}}} hasn't grow up to be lazy. That won't do.$s#$e#Being a parent isn't very easy.
Entries.winter_Thu: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}} makes a lot of noise with that music of {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamGender}}}}. I hope it doesn't disturb the neighbors.

Entries.spring_11.003: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}} was very brave at the doctor's today. I'm proud of {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentGender}}}}.
Entries.spring_11.002: Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}? I'm worried about {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}}'s height. Isn't {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentGender}}}} a little short for {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentGender}}}} age?
Entries.spring_11.000: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}} hates going to the doctor more than anything, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentGender}}}}'ll just have to deal with it.
